name: Creepy Nights
description:
Available Languages: English

This is the first game I ever did alone. I developed in my spare time over 4 months and i'm very happy with the result and I hope you enjoy.

For error/bug report please email: viniciuscarcamo@gmail.com

In the plot, follow the story of Jennifer, a girl who can’t sleep at night.

As hard as it seems, strange creatures are taking away their sleep and sanity.

Is Jennifer going crazy? Do these monsters really exist?

The house is open, come in and find out the truth.

Creepy Nights is a puzzle /platform/horror  game. Inspired by obscure Japanese movies and retro games.

* Full controller support.

* Secrets
